subject: Hockey, Ice
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: Voynov’s indefinite suspension illustrates the way professional sports leagues have changed their approach to domestic violence cases since video surfaced of the N.F.L. player Ray Rice striking his fiancée.
snippet: Voynov’s indefinite suspension illustrates the way professional sports leagues have changed their approach to domestic violence cases since video surfaced of the N.F.L. player Ray Rice striking his fiancée.
